rawInvocation

public boolean rawInvocation(Http.Request request,
                             Http.Response response)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Intercept /@status and check that the Authorization header is valid. Then ask each plugin for a status dump and send it over the HTTP response. You can ask the /@status using the authorization header and putting your status secret key in it. Prior to that you would be required to start play with a -DstatusKey=yourkey

Overrides:
rawInvocation in class PlayPlugin
Parameters:
request - The Play request
response - The Play response
Returns:
true if this plugin has managed this request
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
